translations: n.出身；亲子关系；门第；起源

phrs.translation: 渊源, 父母身分, 血统
亲缘系数, 系数, 个组合进行了亲缘系数
称为亲权鉴定, 亲子鉴别

sentences.sentence: He was admitted to be such by all I ever heard speak of my parentage.
sentences.translation: 据我所听到的关于我的出身的说法，他就是这样一个人。

sentences.sentence: The ruling, though it may yet be reversed, sets aside the principle that biology is the primary determinant of parentage.
sentences.translation: 虽然这一裁决可能会被推翻，但它摒弃了“生物学是亲子关系的主要决定因素”这一原则。

sentences.sentence: He was born of Anglo-American parentage.
